snippet: Dance performances in their styles’ Indian and Southeastern contexts were among the most indelible moments of 2012.
abstract: Alastair Macaulay recalls two eye-opening trips taken during 2012 to see dance in its native setting, along with other highlights from year.
lead_paragraph: Dance performances in their styles’ Indian and Southeastern contexts were among the most indelible moments of 2012.

headline.seo: Jookin and Other Special Performances of 2012
headline.main: Travel Is Educational In a Year of the Move
headline.print_headline: Travel Is Educational In a Year of the Move
